title: SMC_ReadCAM (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_ReadCAM
This function block is designed for loading a cam at runtime and making it available
for the modules
MC_CamTableSelect
and
MC_CamIn
.
The cam to be loaded has to be created within the cam editor before and saved in a â*.CAMâ file (see
SMC_WriteCAM
).
The size of a loadable cam is limited by the library parameters
LibParams.gc_SMC_FILE_MAXCAMEL
(number of elements)
and
LibParams.gc_SMC_FILE_MAXCAMTAP
(number of cam switch actions).

rows.Name: bExecute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: Starts the execution of the function block.

rows:
Name of the file, which contains the cam description in the
defined ASCII format.

rows.Name: bDone
rows.Comment: TRUE: Cam has been read in.

rows:
TRUE: Execution of the function block has not been
finished.
TRUE: Error has occurred within the function block.
